name: swerve
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to change direction, especially suddenly: The bus driver swerved to avoid hitting a cyclist.
If you do not swerve from a principle or certain actions, you continue to think or act as you did in the beginning: She is one of those rare politicians whom one can trust not to swerve from policy and principle. Compare
unswerving
